title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 401.12 - Filing of rate charts and loan forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 401.12 - Filing of rate charts and loan forms

State Regulations
(a) Within 30 business days after a licensee
issues any rate chart(s) setting forth rates or amounts of interest to be used
in its licensed lender operation, such licensee shall file with the
superintendent two copies of each such chart(s). (b) Within 30 business days after a licensee
issues any form or forms of loan agreement or related security instruments to
be used in its licensed lender operation, a licensee shall file with the
superintendent one copy of each such loan agreement or related security
instrument. (c) Every form of loan
agreement or related security instrument and every rate chart(s) of which a
copy or copies are required to be filed with the superintendent pursuant to the
provisions of this section shall indicate a date of issuance and an identifying
symbol consisting of a combination of numbers and/or letters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
401.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
